events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review your credentials carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department as a software developer candidate, based on your resume.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage your application and assist you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening call was successful; your experience aligns well with the software engineer role requirements.
You responded promptly to the recruiterâ€™s questions, providing additional details about your coding projects and experience.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for June 7th, where you will have the opportunity to demonstrate your programming skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully, showcasing strong problem-solving abilities and software development knowledge.
The HR interview is scheduled for June 10th to discuss cultural fit and your career aspirations in detail.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your interpersonal skills and alignment with company values.
An employment offer has been proposed to you, including details about salary, benefits, and onboarding schedule.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
You accepted the employment offer to join as a software engineer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started with required trainings and introductions to engineering team members.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering department.
